channel.title: Wasteland Trades for you
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Wasteland Trades for you" - Last Update: 12/6

item.title: Re: Wasteland Trades for you
item.content:encoded: That's a shame, I guess. Well I have a few more that I'm more than willing to part with.

item.title: Re: Wasteland Trades for you
item.content:encoded:
none of that is tradeable but
Dust Matrix: 3
Dust Pile: 1

Sad

item.title: Wasteland Trades for you
item.content:encoded:
I have several Items that are just taking up space. So I'm trading for Items that won't take up space. Be aware of two things.
1) my offers may be alittle one sided. This can mean you're getting a deal so amazing it could lead to an apocalyptic event, or I'm asking for too much.
2) You may already see it in the summery but I will update this first page of my inventory. In the summery will show, you guessed it, when something new will be added.

I give you list (My inventory)
Acid Vials: 24
Basic Polearm: 1
Blackened dust: 1
Cracked Gear: 2
Dust Matrix: 3
Dust Pile: 1
Perfect Gear: 3
Silver shaft: 1
